nodes.excerpt: Collect and understand user insights with UserLeap’s in-product microsurveys! Access 75+ free microsurvey templates, each designed by our User Research team, and grouped into use cases so you can get answers to your most important product questions, fast.
nodes.title: Microsurvey Template Gallery by UserLeap - Get continuous insights with 75+ free microsurvey templates.
nodes.author: Julie Chabin

localize.description: 用UserLeap的产品内微调查来收集和了解用户洞察力! 访问75个以上的免费微调查模板，每个模板都是由我们的用户研究团队设计的，并按照使用案例进行分类，这样你就可以快速得到你最重要的产品问题的答案。
localize.tagline: 通过75+免费的微调查模板获得持续的洞察力。

localize.description: 用UserLeap的產品內微調查來收集和了解用戶洞察力! 訪問75個以上的免費微調查模板，每個模板都是由我們的用戶研究團隊設計的，並按照使用案例進行分類，這樣你就可以快速得到你最重要的產品問題的答案。
localize.tagline: 通過75+免費的微調查模板獲得持續的洞察力。

nodes.excerpt: Accept payments anywhere online, no coding required. PriceBlocs helps you close more sales in any channel through our super low friction payment links. Accept Apple Pay and Google Pay in just a few clicks.

nodes.excerpt: Branch is your space for work and play! ⠀ Bring back serendipity, spontaneous conversations, hallway bump-ins, watercooler chats and so much more that's missing in remote work with the collaborative and fun virtual HQ.

localize.description: Branch 是您工作和娱乐的空间 ⠀ 通过协作和有趣的虚拟总部，让远程工作中缺少的偶然性、自发的对话、走廊上的碰撞、水杯聊天等重新回归。

nodes.excerpt: Listnr helps you start a Podcast in 100+ Voices and 22 languages without recording anything, we use Speech Synthesis technology from Google, Amazon, Microsoft and IBM to power Listnr and deliver great results!
nodes.title: Listnr - Start a podcast without recording anything

localize.description: Listnr帮助你以100多种声音和22种语言开始播客，而无需录制任何东西，我们使用谷歌、亚马逊、微软和IBM的语音合成技术为Listnr提供动力，并提供伟大的结果。

nodes.excerpt: Too many tools? Too many back-and-forths? It's time to build the common ground between remote teams. The only place to truly work together across roles without juggling many tools. Allo is your first remote workspace.
nodes.title: Allo for Desktop - Work together across roles without juggling many tools
nodes.author: Ray Hong

localize.description: 工具太多？太多的来回奔波？是时候建立远程团队之间的共同点了。唯一能真正实现跨角色协同工作的地方，而不需要玩弄许多工具。Allo是您的第一个远程工作空间。
localize.tagline: 跨角色协同工作，不需要使用很多工具。

localize.description: 工具太多？太多的來回奔波？是時候建立遠程團隊之間的共同點了。唯一能真正實現跨角色協同工作的地方，而不需要玩弄許多工具。Allo是您的第一個遠程工作空間。
localize.tagline: 跨角色協同工作，不需要使用很多工具。

nodes.excerpt: 📈HireBeat for Employers is an automated interview screening platform that saves employers time 🕗 and money💰! HireBeat delivers one-way interview invitations that allow the employer to review & evaluate candidate performance anytime, anywhere.
nodes.title: HireBeat - Automated interview platform that accelerates hiring process
nodes.author: Ning Wei

localize.description: 📈HireBeat for Employers是一个自动面试筛选平台，为雇主节省时间🕗和金钱💰! HireBeat提供单向面试邀请，让雇主随时随地审查和评估候选人的表现。
localize.tagline: 自动面试平台，加速招聘流程。

localize.description: 📈HireBeat for Employers是一個自動面試篩選平臺，爲僱主節省時間🕗和金錢💰! HireBeat提供單向面試邀請，讓僱主隨時隨地審查和評估候選人的表現。
localize.tagline: 自動面試平臺，加速招聘流程。

nodes.excerpt: Find the most converting headline on your landing site with Juggler! It is an intuitive and straightforward A/B testing tool for your site and it's fully online. Just add the lightweight script on your site and you are ready to find the best headline!
nodes.title: Juggler.dev - The easiest way to proceed A/B testing on your site
nodes.author: Vlad Dekhanov

localize.description: 用Juggler在你的登陆网站上找到最具转化率的标题! 它是一个直观直接的A/B测试工具，为您的网站，它是完全在线的。只需在您的网站上添加轻量级脚本，您就可以找到最好的标题了!
localize.tagline: 在您的网站上进行A/B测试的最简单方法。

localize.description: 用Juggler在你的登陸網站上找到最具轉化率的標題! 它是一個直觀直接的A/B測試工具，爲您的網站，它是完全在線的。只需在您的網站上添加輕量級腳本，您就可以找到最好的標題了!
localize.tagline: 在您的網站上進行A/B測試的最簡單方法。

nodes.excerpt: BlockSurvey is an online form and survey platform with a focus on privacy and security. Think of it as an alternative to SurveyMonkey, Typeform, Google Forms but with a focus on privacy and security. It is powered by Stacks Blockchain.
nodes.title: BlockSurvey 2.0 - Secure forms & surveys, powered by Stacks blockchain
nodes.author: Wilson Bright

localize.description: BlockSurvey是一个注重隐私和安全的在线表格和调查平台。把它看作是SurveyMonkey、Typeform、Google Forms的替代品，但注重隐私和安全。它由Stacks Blockchain提供支持。
localize.tagline: 由Stacks区块链提供支持的安全表格和调查问卷。

localize.description: BlockSurvey是一個注重隱私和安全的在線表格和調查平臺。把它看作是SurveyMonkey、Typeform、Google Forms的替代品，但注重隱私和安全。它由Stacks Blockchain提供支持。
localize.tagline: 由Stacks區塊鏈提供支持的安全表格和調查問卷。

nodes.excerpt: Recipes are a new way to create step-by-step code walkthroughs right in your ReadMe documentation. By helping you showcase the best use cases for your APIs, it's easy for developers to get started faster while saving your team time on developer support.
nodes.title: ReadMe Recipes - Step-by-step code walkthroughs for your API
nodes.author: Gregory Koberger

localize.description: Recipes是一种新的方式，可以在您的ReadMe文档中创建分步的代码演练。通过帮助您展示API的最佳用例，开发人员可以轻松上手，同时节省您的团队在开发人员支持上的时间。
localize.tagline: 为您的API提供逐步的代码演练。

localize.description: Recipes是一種新的方式，可以在您的ReadMe文檔中創建分步的代碼演練。通過幫助您展示API的最佳用例，開發人員可以輕鬆上手，同時節省您的團隊在開發人員支持上的時間。
localize.tagline: 爲您的API提供逐步的代碼演練。

nodes.excerpt: SquadPal is the app for the life of your remote/hybrid team. Through games, challenges and fun activities, SquadPal helps you create a safe space to build better connections with your teammates. Get started today, it's free for teams of up to 20 people! 🔥
nodes.title: SquadPal - Build stronger connections & have fun with your remote team
nodes.author: Nichole Elizabeth DeMeré

localize.description: SquadPal是你的远程/混合团队的生活应用。通过游戏、挑战和有趣的活动，SquadPal帮助您创建一个安全的空间，与您的团队成员建立更好的联系。今天就开始吧，20人以下的团队都可以免费使用。🔥
localize.tagline: 与您的远程团队建立更紧密的联系并享受乐趣。

localize.description: SquadPal是你的遠程/混合團隊的生活應用。通過遊戲、挑戰和有趣的活動，SquadPal幫助您創建一個安全的空間，與您的團隊成員建立更好的聯繫。今天就開始吧，20人以下的團隊都可以免費使用。🔥
localize.tagline: 與您的遠程團隊建立更緊密的聯繫並享受樂趣。

nodes.excerpt: Ennerate (YC W21) does business valuations for small and medium sized traditional businesses (plumbers, manufacturing, etc.) for 5x faster and 10x cheaper than existing services. Users upload financials, take a survey, and our models generate the valuation.
nodes.title: Ennerate - Automated business valuations for 'Main Street' companies
nodes.author: Michael Seibel

localize.description: Ennerate（YC W21）为中小型传统企业（水电工、制造业等）做商业估值，比现有服务快5倍，便宜10倍。用户上传财务资料，进行调查，我们的模型就会生成估值。
localize.tagline: 为 "大街 "公司进行自动商业评估。

localize.description: Ennerate（YC W21）爲中小型傳統企業（水電工、製造業等）做商業估值，比現有服務快5倍，便宜10倍。用戶上傳財務資料，進行調查，我們的模型就會生成估值。
localize.tagline: 爲 "大街 "公司進行自動商業評估。

nodes.excerpt: Discover the power of Walling and kickstart your next project with the new Walling templates. No complex workflows. No wasted hours setting up random templates that don't work. With Walling, it is simple, just put it on a wall! Start a new wall: https://wall.new

nodes.excerpt: GRID is a productivity tool that transforms spreadsheets into interactive, visually dynamic web documents. GRID makes sharing and presenting spreadsheet data and models smart, quick, and exceptionally valuable.
nodes.title: GRID - Turn your spreadsheets into smart, interactive web documents
nodes.author: Hjalmar Gislason

localize.description: GRID是一个生产力工具，它可以将电子表格转化为交互式的、视觉上动态的网络文档。GRID使共享和展示电子表格数据和模型变得智能、快速和异常有价值。
localize.tagline: 将您的电子表格变成智能的交互式网络文档

localize.description: GRID是一個生產力工具，它可以將電子表格轉化爲交互式的、視覺上動態的網絡文檔。GRID使共享和展示電子表格數據和模型變得智能、快速和異常有價值。
localize.tagline: 將您的電子表格變成智能的交互式網絡文檔

nodes.excerpt: Jumpstart your next SaaS product with Bedrock: the modern full-stack Next.js & GraphQL boilerplate with user authentication, subscription payments, teams, invitations, emails and everything else you need
nodes.title: Bedrock - Full-stack Next.js & GraphQL boilerplate for SaaS products
nodes.author: Nik Graf

localize.description: 使用Bedrock启动您的下一个SaaS产品：现代的全栈Next.js和GraphQL模板，具有用户认证、订阅支付、团队、邀请、电子邮件和其他一切您需要的功能。
localize.tagline: 用于SaaS产品的全栈Next.js和GraphQL模板。

localize.tagline: 用於SaaS產品的全棧Next.js和GraphQL模板。

nodes.excerpt: Brightful LIVE for Clubhouse is a collection of essential features that help your Clubhouse rooms standout amongst the rest. Visualize your ideas by drawing on the Whiteboard, while engaging listeners with Q&As and Polls.
nodes.title: Whiteboard, Q&A, and Polls for Clubhouse - Supercharge your clubhouse room and differentiate your talk
nodes.author: Nichole Elizabeth DeMeré

localize.description: Brightful LIVE for Clubhouse 是一个基本功能的集合，它能帮助您的Clubhouse房间在其他房间中脱颖而出。通过在白板上画画来实现您的想法，同时通过问答和民意调查来吸引听众。
localize.tagline: 超强的会所房，差异化的谈资。

localize.description: Brightful LIVE for Clubhouse 是一個基本功能的集合，它能幫助您的Clubhouse房間在其他房間中脫穎而出。通過在白板上畫畫來實現您的想法，同時通過問答和民意調查來吸引聽衆。
localize.tagline: 超強的會所房，差異化的談資。

nodes.excerpt: Eqtble unlocks the value of your HR data by answering why top performers are leaving and why qualified candidates are declining offers. Built by connecting with 150+ systems, we deliver insights on Workforce, Talent Acquisition, Engagement, and Compensation.
nodes.title: eqtble - Making it easy for companies to gain insights from HR data
nodes.author: Kat Manalac

localize.description: Eqtble通过回答为什么表现优异的员工会离开，为什么合格的候选人会拒绝聘用，来释放您的人力资源数据的价值。通过与150多个系统的连接，我们提供关于劳动力、人才招聘、参与和薪酬的见解。
localize.tagline: 让企业轻松从人力资源数据中获得洞察力。

localize.description: Eqtble通過回答爲什麼表現優異的員工會離開，爲什麼合格的候選人會拒絕聘用，來釋放您的人力資源數據的價值。通過與150多個系統的連接，我們提供關於勞動力、人才招聘、參與和薪酬的見解。
localize.tagline: 讓企業輕鬆從人力資源數據中獲得洞察力。

nodes.excerpt: Zealth is building a software to help hospitals provide continuous round the clock monitoring to their cancer patients, once they leave the hospital and alerts them if the patient is at high risk.
nodes.title: Zealth - SaaS for remote monitoring of cancer patients
nodes.author: Michael Seibel

localize.description: Zealth正在打造一款软件，帮助医院为癌症患者提供连续的全天候监测，一旦患者离开医院，如果患者处于高危状态，就会发出警报。
localize.tagline: 癌症患者远程监测的SaaS

localize.description: Zealth正在打造一款軟件，幫助醫院爲癌症患者提供連續的全天候監測，一旦患者離開醫院，如果患者處於高危狀態，就會發出警報。
localize.tagline: 癌症患者遠程監測的SaaS

nodes.excerpt: SaaS Competition is increasing rapidly. The more competition a company faces, the harder it is to get clients. If you don’t have strong positioning on the market, use this worksheet to create unique positioning. The Worksheet is FREE until 25th March.
nodes.title: SaaS Positioning Worksheet - Worksheet to create $1M SaaS positioning

localize.description: SaaS的竞争正在迅速增加。公司面临的竞争越大，获得客户的难度就越大。如果你在市场上没有强大的定位，请使用这个工作表来创建独特的定位。该工作表在3月25日之前是免费的。
localize.tagline: 打造100万SaaS定位的工作表

localize.description: SaaS的競爭正在迅速增加。公司面臨的競爭越大，獲得客戶的難度就越大。如果你在市場上沒有強大的定位，請使用這個工作表來創建獨特的定位。該工作表在3月25日之前是免費的。

nodes.excerpt: The simplest and most modern data-scraper as a service, as if postman was automated! Focus on developing data-dependant apps without worrying about the data gathering infrastructure. Made for aggregators, bots and data-driven applications.
nodes.title: Nozomi - Postman, but automated
nodes.author: Nicholas Chen

localize.description: 最简单、最现代的数据搜刮器作为一种服务，仿佛邮递员是自动的! 专注于开发依赖数据的应用程序，而不用担心数据收集基础设施。为聚合器、机器人和数据驱动的应用而生。
localize.tagline: 邮递员，但是是自动的

localize.description: 最簡單、最現代的數據搜刮器作爲一種服務，彷彿郵遞員是自動的! 專注於開發依賴數據的應用程序，而不用擔心數據收集基礎設施。爲聚合器、機器人和數據驅動的應用而生。
localize.tagline: 郵遞員，但是是自動的

nodes.excerpt: With Portal, let your clients login on your own website and give them one place for payments, messaging, file-sharing, eSignatures, intake forms, and more.

nodes.excerpt: Viable is a user experience analysis engine that aggregrates, sorts, and tags helpdesk, survey, and live chat customer feedback so you can ask questions about what your customers think, feel, and do -- and get human-like answers in seconds, powered by GPT-3.
nodes.title: Viable - Find immediate insights in surveys, helpdesk, and reviews
nodes.author: Todd Goldberg

localize.description: Viable是一个用户体验分析引擎，它可以对服务台、调查和即时聊天的客户反馈进行汇总、分类和标记，这样你就可以就客户的想法、感受和行为提出问题，并在几秒钟内得到类似于人类的答案，它由GPT-3提供技术支持。
localize.tagline: 在调查、帮助台和评论中找到即时的见解。

localize.description: Viable是一個用戶體驗分析引擎，它可以對服務檯、調查和即時聊天的客戶反饋進行彙總、分類和標記，這樣你就可以就客戶的想法、感受和行爲提出問題，並在幾秒鐘內得到類似於人類的答案，它由GPT-3提供技術支持。
localize.tagline: 在調查、幫助臺和評論中找到即時的見解。

nodes.excerpt: 🧠 Smart, personalized product recommendations for Shopify stores--driven by real customer insights. 💥 Our AI algorithm is trained by millions of data points about what customers want, specifically for fashion products.
nodes.title: YesPlz - Personalized fashion recommendations for Shopify
nodes.author: Nichole Elizabeth DeMeré

localize.description: 🧠 为Shopify商店提供智能、个性化的产品推荐--由真实的客户洞察力驱动。💥 我们的人工智能算法是通过数百万个数据点进行训练，了解客户的需求，特别是时尚产品。
localize.tagline: 为Shopify提供个性化的时尚推荐

localize.description: 🧠 爲Shopify商店提供智能、個性化的產品推薦--由真實的客戶洞察力驅動。💥 我們的人工智能算法是通過數百萬個數據點進行訓練，瞭解客戶的需求，特別是時尚產品。
localize.tagline: 爲Shopify提供個性化的時尚推薦

nodes.excerpt: Trend brainstorms, deep dives into different ecosystem (including case studies and gaps in the market analyses), expert interviews, and niche market data to help founders and investors spot opportunities.
nodes.title: Opportunities.so - Deep dives, trend brainstorms, and niche data for founders
nodes.author: Jakob Greenfeld

localize.description: 趋势头脑风暴，深度挖掘不同的生态系统（包括案例分析和市场分析中的差距），专家访谈和利基市场数据，帮助创始人和投资者发现机会。
localize.tagline: 为创始人提供深度挖掘、趋势头脑风暴和利基数据。

localize.description: 趨勢頭腦風暴，深度挖掘不同的生態系統（包括案例分析和市場分析中的差距），專家訪談和利基市場數據，幫助創始人和投資者發現機會。
localize.tagline: 爲創始人提供深度挖掘、趨勢頭腦風暴和利基數據。
